daily_summary.headline: Starlink Launches and Aurora Opportunities Highlight the Day

top_events.title: Starlink Group 10-36 Launch
top_events.description: SpaceX's Falcon 9 Block 5 is set to launch the Starlink Group 10-36 mission. This mission will deploy 29 satellites for the Starlink mega-constellation, enhancing global internet coverage.
top_events.action: Watch the live stream for the launch.

top_events.title: Aurora Viewing Opportunity
top_events.description: A G1-level geomagnetic storm is expected, providing a potential aurora viewing opportunity for observers at high latitudes.
top_events.action: Check the sky for auroras if you're at a high latitude.

top_events.title: Firefly Alpha Test Flight
top_events.description: Firefly Aerospace's Firefly Alpha is scheduled for a test flight named 'Stairway to Seven'. This flight aims to validate key systems after a previous launch failure.
top_events.action: Follow updates on the test flight.

opportunities.recommendation: Possible aurora at high latitudes. Best for northern locations (65°+). Worth checking if conditions are optimal.
